metadata.title: API Best Practices - AUTO PARTS: COMP/VPS
metadata.summary: This guide provides best practices for using the AUTO PARTS compatibility API (COMP/VPS). It covers data structures for vehicle compatibility, including brand, model, year, and version IDs. The guide also details specific endpoints for retrieving vehicle lists and compatibility details.
use_cases: Retrieving a list of compatible vehicles for a specific auto part.
Identifying vehicle details (brand, model, year, version) for compatibility.
Filtering vehicle compatibility data based on specific criteria.
Adding compatibility information to existing items.
